P

Paddock - Class in hippodrome
Place where the horses are paradded before the Spectators.
Paddock(GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface, int, int) - Constructor for class hippodrome.Paddock
Creates a Paddock.
PADDOCK_HOST - Static variable in class configurations.ServerConfigurations
Definition of the Paddock host for the execution.
PADDOCK_NAME - Static variable in class configurations.RMIConfigurations
Name of the Paddock hippodrome region on RMI Registry.
PADDOCK_PORT - Static variable in class configurations.ServerConfigurations
Definition of the Paddock port for the execution.
PADDOCK_TIME_TO_SLEEP - Static variable in class configurations.ServerConfigurations
Definition of the Paddock time to sleep for the execution.
PaddockInterface - Interface in hippodrome
Interface of the place where the horses are paradded before the Spectators.
placeABet(int, int, int) - Method in class hippodrome.BettingCentre
Changes the Spectator's state to Placing a Bet (PAB) and lets a Spectator place a bet onto the BettingCentre.
placeABet(int, int, int) - Method in interface hippodrome.BettingCentreInterface

proceedToPaddock(int) - Method in class hippodrome.ControlCentre
Signal given by the last pair Horse/Jockey that arrives on Paddock, notifying the ControlCentre.waitForTheNextRace(int) of the Spectators.
proceedToPaddock(int) - Method in interface hippodrome.ControlCentreInterface
 
proceedToPaddock(int) - Method in class hippodrome.Paddock
Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Paddock (ATP) and waits for the last Spectator to arrive on Paddock on the Paddock.goCheckHorses(int, boolean) method.
proceedToPaddock(int) - Method in interface hippodrome.PaddockInterface
 
proceedToStable(int, int) - Method in class hippodrome.Stable
Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Stable (ATS) and waits till the current race is, in fact, the current race of the event which is about to start.
proceedToStable(int) - Method in class hippodrome.Stable
Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Stable (ATS).
proceedToStable(int, int) - Method in interface hippodrome.StableInterface

proceedToStartLine(int) - Method in class hippodrome.Paddock
Signal that the race is about to start, by a HorseJockey.
proceedToStartLine(int) - Method in interface hippodrome.PaddockInterface
 
proceedToStartLine(int) - Method in class hippodrome.RacingTrack
Changes the state of the pair Horse/Jockey to At the Start Line (ATSL) and waits till the last RacingTrack.startTheRace() is performed by the Entities.
proceedToStartLine(int) - Method in interface hippodrome.RacingTrackInterface
